text: thumb|320px|Locations of conflicts worldwide in 2019 The following is a list of armed conflicts with victims in 2019. Conflict- related fatalities in the world's 17 deadliest countries in 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 and 2019. ==List guidelines== Listed are the armed conflicts having done globally at least 100 victims and at least 1 victim during the year 2019. ==10,000+ deaths in 2019== Conflicts in the following list have caused at least 10,000 direct violent deaths in 2019. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Start of conflict ! Conflict ! Continent ! Location ! data-sort-type="number" | Fatalities in 2019 |- | align=center | 1978 | Afghanistan conflict * Soviet–Afghan War * Afghan Civil War (1989–1992) * Afghan Civil War (1992–1996) * Afghan Civil War (1996–2001) * Current phase | Asia | | |- | align=center | 2006 | Mexican Drug War | North America | | |- | align=center | 2011 | Yemeni Crisis * Yemeni Civil War (2015–present) * Al-Qaeda insurgency in Yemen * South Yemen insurgency * Saudi–Yemeni border conflict (2015–present) *Saudi Arabian-led intervention in Yemen | Asia | | |- | align=center | 2011 | Syrian Civil War | | Asia | | http://www.syriahr.com/?p=353335 |} ==1,000–9,999 deaths in 2019== Conflicts in the following list have caused at least 1,000 and fewer than 10,000 direct violent deaths in 2019. Conflicts causing at least 1,000 deaths in one calendar year are considered wars by the Uppsala Conflict Data Program. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Start of conflict ! Conflict ! Continent ! Location ! data-sort-type="number" | Fatalities in 2019 |- | align=center | 1984 | Kurdish–Turkish conflict * Kurdish–Turkish conflict (2015–present) | Asia | | 1,420+ |- | align=center | 1991 | Somali Civil War * Current phase | Africa | | 2,637 |- | align=center | 2003 | Iraq conflict *Iraq War *Iraqi insurgency (2011–2013) *Iraqi Civil War (2014–2017) *Iraqi insurgency (2017–present) | Asia | | 2,362< |- |align=center | 2014 |Libyan Crisis *Libyan Civil War (2014–present) |Africa | | 2,200+ |} ==100–999 deaths in 2019== Conflicts in the following list have caused at least 100 and fewer than 1,000 direct violent deaths in 2019. {| class="wikitable sortable" id="conflicts100" |- ! Start of conflict ! Conflict ! Continent !
